author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sterling Construction Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.11
text:
March 5 (Reuters) - Sterling Construction Company Inc :
* STERLING CONSTRUCTION COMPANY, INC. REPORTS 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR RESULTS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.11 * STERLING CONSTRUCTION COMPANY - ‚ÄçCOMBINED BACKLOG AT DEC. 31 WAS $994.5 MILLION VERSUS $1.04 BILLION LAST YEAR
* SEES 2018 NET INCOME ATTRIBUTABLE TO STERLING COMMON STOCKHOLDERS TO BE IN RANGE OF $23 MILLION TO $26 MILLION
* STERLING CONSTRUCTION COMPANY - 2018 NET INCOME ATTRIBUTABLE TO STERLING COMMON STOCKHOLDERS GUIDANCE IMPLIES YEAR-OVER-YEAR EPS GROWTH OF OVER 100% Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
